content.detailedDescription: Walked out my back porch to have a cigarette.  building right in front of me had a 1-3 ft in size flicker/tumble south to north then change direction 90 degrees straight up. it disappeared for a second.   i called my wife and my daughter who about 2 min later i kept looking ended up seeing what i saw. they too described the same thing i saw.
content.summary: White aluminum tumbling object

content.detailedDescription:
During walk on govt road pahoa hawaii near hawaiian beaches took a picture of sunrise. note moon was setting behind me. notice after picture cylinder object above sunrise. next day again took picture and again noticed object. it had moved   same about 12 times. noticed it on 20 may again. object had changed positions but was still hovering. sent in picture to channel 2 news,  told it was the moon. you can see the object in front of clouds. picture delegated from there files

i'm a retired air force pilot. this is not the moon or a weather ballon
content.summary: Cylinder shows up in pictures. at least 12 times. can not see it as its in or near sunrise

content.detailedDescription:
I was on my deck taking pictures of the treetop from a lounge chair.  
i took these 3 photos.
the first, nothing unusual.
the second, an object that i thought was a dragonfly.  i saw it in the camera but when i lowered the camera a second later it was gone.
took the third shot, nothing there.  
to my knowledge it was just there a second, i did not see it move, did not hear anything.
it was just there, then it was gone.
it happened so fast i didn't have time to have feelings.  but as soon as i saw it and took a second picture i ran in the house to see the photos on my computer.
content.summary: Taking pictures of a tree on my deck.  object appeared when i looked through camera but was gone immediately.

content.detailedDescription: Hmmmm on skidoo going north stopped on trail,for cig/rest,there was a back drop of a long ridge line . the moon was out shining from west to east and it was crisp and clear.The object travelled into view from the southeast between tree line and ridge line and was decending slowly as it went.The object was long square rect.It was mulit coloured with no lights visable this is as close as i can get as it is almost unexplainable .It was very large > i have been in avaition flying and fixing.I have never seen anything like this.I have seen 7 lights in the sky with one dissapearing and as the moon came up the was smoke in the general area where it appeared that there was something going on. i have also seen a green orb travelling north winter time inthe same direction as my self height maybe 150 size maybe 100ft dia and then it was gone.
content.summary: Check below

content.detailedDescription: was observing sunset to view the planetary alignment of jupiter, venus and mercury due wnw and a light of unusual color teal-green caught my attention a few degrees to the north of my viewing area approximately 1/2 hour after i began viewing. i watched curiously as it came from above distant horizon line approximately 1/2 mile to 3/4 mile distance, no sound emanating. i watched it descend into a valley, it was still twilight and could still make out features in the valley. i watched as it descended and ascended three times until i gave up as it was still in the valley and i was getting cold due to a cold snap in the climate, and some strange vocalizations coming from below in the valley in the direction of the object i was viewing. i observed it for approximately 20 minutes. i am an avid stunt kite flier and am sure this was no kite or remote controlled airplane/helicopter. also a regular backyard astronomer for 38 years, an avid ufologist as well. i was not drinking or under the influence of any drugs at the time of my viewing. sky was clearing with thin high level stratus clouds above and in the distance that were quickly dissipating due to lack of daylight heating/convection. no wind at all.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Very bright teal green

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting out in our backyard. he suddenly looked over my shoulder and said "what the hell is that?"  the object was almost directly over us and was huge. it was a large translucent square and within the square was a very bright pulsating white light that changed to a faint glowing red and then back to white. we watched it slowly and silently float across the sky until it was out of our view due to the tree line.  it moved slower than a plane. we both video taped it with our smart phones.
content.summary: Large ball within a translucent square.

content.detailedDescription:
I set up a video camera on a tripod facing ne and began filming the cloudy sky, as i did yesterday on my patio. i only filmed for a minute because my batteries were weak.

after loading the video in my computer, i watched closely. at 21-22 seconds there appeared to be an object at 0900 direction, similar to a stealth fighter. there is also a possible shock wave noise just before the craft flew by. i've attached the video. turn up the volume to listen to the noise and observe the object at 21-22 seconds. it's gone in a millisecond.
content.summary: Set up video camera towards the ne on a tripod. began filming the sky for a few minutes.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: Was traveling west on rt4, just coming out of woodstock vt at 9:01pm, (checked time because i texted someone within a minute of this siting)something caught my eye, about 3/4 up from line of site through windsheid. a white glowing orb apprx 20-30ft in diameter, estimated about 800ft in alltitude over a hilly area,traveling west by northwest at est, 300knots. for a split second i thought it was a meteor but there was no trail behind it. no landing lights, no visible exit source for thrust (turbine), just a big glowing ball that went just about above me then traveled in a straightline til a mountain hide it's view. immediatly texted afriend flipping out. first time ever seeing anything.
content.summary: White glowing orb,  300knots traveling west  by northwest, 800ft alltitude in vermont

content.detailedDescription:
my wife, daughter and i were working in the backyard and had sat down under the carport to take a break.  i looked up and saw two jet airliners at cruising level leaving contrails, one higher and farther away than the other.  noticed what appeared to be a shiny or white sphere-shaped object hovering closer in and lower than the two aircraft.  asked my daughter and wife if they see it and they do.  as we discuss what this might be, it slowly moves left and up at a 45 degree angle.  after about 10 seconds, it slows, stops, then begins moving right on a level course for about 15 seconds.  as my daughter goes inside to get her phone and take a picture, the object moves up and right at a 45 degree angle, then quickly accelerates straight up.  by the time my daughter gets back with her phone, it is now pin-point size and too close to the sun to see.
  when i first noticed it, i thought it might be a mylar balloon or a plastic shopping bag but was too big for the altitude it appeared to be at and movement was too erratic for the constant wind.  size at beginning of sighting was pea-sized held at arm's length. would guess altitude to be 5000ft at beginning of event.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Shiny object hovers, climbs left, moves right, climbs right and then up out of sight.

content.detailedDescription:
I was home sunday afternoon and enjoying the blue sky on my back patio. after observing what i thought was a balloon travel from east to west, but changed direction and disappeared rapidly, i decided to film the sky for a little while. i set up a vivitar video camera on a tripod of the southern blue sky at an angle of about 90 degrees and left it for about 5 minutes. that was the only place i could safely position the camera due to a pet and trees in the way.

i then loaded the video into my computer and watched at real time. i discovered about 20 white or dark objects at different times from different directions over the time of 5 minutes. there appears to be a lot of activity up there. i then began filming again facing north this time, but with a lot less activity. only three objects in about three minutes. i was running out of battery at this point.

i took random pictures of objects when i lived in nc a few years ago, so this was not the first time. i sent those pictures to mufon in nc then. but, i have not had much time for research due to a busy work schedule.

i have attached two videos. i also have documentation of the times of each object viewed in the videos. video 2 from 1:03-4:21 11 objects/ video 3 1:17-5:32 8 objects or more. you have to look closely to see them and then use slow motion to capture the speed. there are also birds and insects during the span of the videos and these are obvious.

it's nice to know they are here too!
content.summary: I saw an object that appeared to be a small balloon, but it changed direction and moved off at a high rate of speed and disappeared..

content.detailedDescription: A group of us were gathered around a bonfire in a wide open field way out in the country. the elevation is fairly high and we had a mostly 360 degree view of the sky. the sky was clear and the full moon had just risen.  someone said "what is that" and we all turned to the west and saw 3 bright orange lights way off in the distance. they were lined up vertically equally spaced and one of the lights moved around the other lights. the movement was smooth, quick and looked very deliberate, not random. the lights continued moving towards us. they weren't getting bigger, but the movement in our general direction was noticeable. they were star like in appearance but larger. at first i thought they were planets but it didn't make sense. especially when they moved. after about a minute the lights dissolved. approximately a minute later we all noticed 4 bright orange lights in the northern sky moving towards us equally spaced apart horizontally but at some distance from us. the lights were much lower to the ground. at first we thought maybe they were planes but the movement and spacing was not like a plane or a group of planes. the four lights went below our line of sight which was blocked by trees off in the distance.  everyone was surprised and a little bewildered by what we saw. nobody could make sense of it. two people had cameras but they were too caught up in the moment of watching the objects to remember to take a picture. the total observation time was probably about 2 minutes.
content.summary: 3 bright orange lights in the western sky just after moonrise then 4 lights in the north

content.detailedDescription:
We (4 people ) were having dinner around a campfire when we observed 8 egg shaped objects at approx. 5,000 ft or so altitude moving at about 200 mph in in an easterly direction in a staggered line formation with one of them trailing by about 3 or so miles. there was no sound and there was no movement we could see on their axis. there was no blinking of running lights as required by law.The light given off was a yellowish brown and was steady.
we all 4 had the same observation and my wife took photos of the event with her cell phone. as for feelings i was kind of glad i have finally saw what every one has been talking about. as for me i am a former policeman and a trained observer and cannot place this with anything else i have seen before.
the objects moved across the sky at a steady rate not changing there position in relation to each other and moved on out of range. there was no sound of any sort. the sky was clear and nothing to interfere with our observation.
content.summary: 8 glowing objects passed from west going east

content.detailedDescription: Hi i hope this isn't gov. ran bs anywaz this is the most significant story you will ever hear in the ufo community ok so i was in 6th grade went to camp in ca. i think it was calvin crest campgrounds by oakdale. there were approx. 50 kids and 5 adults . we were playing flashlight tag at night in the forest i came out of the tree s into a meadow facing a small pond and looked up and saw something that has changed my life a hovering craft it wasnt making a peep and it was so close i could throw a rock at it but i didn't. i started yelling who's got a camera and come out of the trees to see a ufo ! so the rest of the kids and adults were standing there staring at this ufo hovering above the small pond about 75 feet off the ground it was mostly dark metal greyish and it had one row of lights going around it in the middle and each light was a different color thats it! im still to this day wondering why me and some of the ppl ive contacted cant remember how it left ?? the ufo was probably about 40ft wide by 15ft tall . i am trying to contact anyone who was there period some ppl dont want to talk or even try to remember it . i remember it vividly and it came on the news when i got home!You should have seen my aunt face drop when it did cause i just got done telling her bout it ha! since then ive witnessed for sure one other and possibly two or three other ufos so im interested in regression i can handle it . so ive seen a lot of other ufo drawings similar and photos . i hope someone contacts me to help me get the 40 witnesses from this event.
content.summary: 6th grade camp 1987 40 or more witnesses i could have thrown a rock ufo

content.detailedDescription: I observe strange cloud in the sky over komenda in slovenia! time about 40 min!
content.summary: Cloud in the sky?

content.detailedDescription: very shallow, powerful light beam of bluish color like when magnesium is put on fire. it was flying at 25 to 45 feet from the ground and was silent. the speed was around 25km/hr
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Light beam, very powerfull and silent

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting at the portville drive in when my wife noticed an orange flickering light slowly moving through the sky from west to east. it would go from an almost yellowish color to orange and dark red. it had no blinking lights. it seemed very high in the sky and moved at a steady rate and line of travel before fading out. another followed minutes later in the exact pattern and direction as the previous one followed by a third a few minutes after the second faded out. they all reached the same point in the sky as they just got dim and disappeared. many people in the drive in saw and watched these objects traverse the sky and no one seemed to have any idea what they were. we don't know if they made any sound as the sound of the movie playing was quite loud.
content.summary: Flickering orange objects moving over wesern ny

content.detailedDescription: I left work at 9:00pm. while driving north past the i-80 overpass on top of north greeley hwy, i noticed 3 bright star-like lights, towards the north west, in the direction of warren airforce base. it was too bright out for these 3 lights to be stars and their elevation was too low. also they were clearly visible to be in our atmosphere. they stayed stationary as i continued to drive. as i reached the bottom of the hill still heading north, i made a left onto 9th street to get to parsley blvd. took a right onto parsley, headed north to ames under pass. turned right onto ames, then took a left into west lincolnway by the eagles nest bar. headed west down the road to missile drive, took a right and remained on the road which a mile or so turns into happy jack rd. while driving, these 3 lights remained in a triangle formation but appeared to be moving very slow but lowering in elevation. stationary but not . as i drove out onto round top road which is west of the airforce base, i got out of my vehicle to try to capture these lights on my phone. it became darker as the sun went into dusk finally and these three lights lowered more still in a triangle formation. during this time, the lowest of the lights kept brightening and then dimmed, and then would flicker red, white, blue, and an orangish color but in a rapid and sporadic sequence. then it would go back into a continuous glow. the other two lights seemed to just dim and then brighten back up again, and then dim as they lowered some more in elevation(or they were moving further away in distance to the west.) all in all, i can attest that these weren't stars. they were too bright during the little sunlight we had to be man made (planes, helicopters, etc) and their triangle formation they were in appeared to be a perfect triangle for the most part until they slowly started to descend into the distance. i observed this for about 40 to 45 minutes until the lights disappeared. within this time, i had contacted my father, and from his location (west jefferson rd/south cheyenne) him and my mother were able to witness this event as well. it was indeed a strange and exciting thing to see. (note: the video i have attached isn't the best of quality recorded on iphone. the lights are above the horizon, where the cloud is. pretty much dead center of video view. . the lights along the ground are from man made structures. you can tell them apart.)
content.summary: 3 lights. triangle formation. during sunset to dusk. too bright to be stars.

disappeared. within this time, i had contacted my father, and from his location (west jefferson rd/south cheyenne) him and my mother were able to witness this event as well. it was indeed a strange and exciting thing to see. (note: the video i have attached isn't the best of quality recorded on iphone. the lights are above the horizon, where the cloud is. pretty much dead center of video view. . the lights along the ground are from man made structures. you can tell them apart.)

content.detailedDescription:
My fiance and i were cooking bbq on our balcony and he pointed out a strange orange and red light in the sky. i have to mention, this is not the first time we've seen something in the same general area. the first time was on the 4th of july last year. but back to this incident. i looked up and saw the glowing red light and it did appear to be moving in a strange way, almost too slowly and in an indiscernible direction. i kept trying to make up my mind as to what it was. we live very close to the burbank airport so we see planes all the time. in this case, that familiarity allowed me to identify this as something different (again). we watched the light and i said "is it still moving?" i stared at it and noticed it moving slowly to the left and thought ok, maybe it's just a plane that's so far away it seems to be moving slowly. and then the light began to diminish very quickly, as though it were moving upward and out of view although i cannot say i saw anything move upward. it faded very steadily away into nothingness, almost evaporated. moments later, a helicopter appeared and shined a light into the general area. it flew past where the light was and left, circling back around our apartment building. neither my fiance nor myself noticed any sound from the helicopter although we may just have been excited, this being our second sighting. we also saw an airplane moments later and knew instantly that what we just saw was not any kind of aircraft we know about. as we looked at the plane i saw the red light flash one last time and go away. it occurs to me now that perhaps this was not the same red light. i can't be sure, but i am certain there was a second red flash after the first red-orange glowing light faded away.

the first sighting was very similar, although the light was blueish green and not red. that time it also zig zagged a lot more and clearly shot upward into the sky at an extreme speed i have never seen before. it was still daylight so that may be why i was able to see the departure better. there were also more witnesses to the first sighting. approximately 8.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: Orange and red fireball appearing out of nowhere moving andhovering, then disapearing when helicopter approched

content.detailedDescription: I took a break from watching hockey on tv and went to my patio for a cigarette. i noticed a orange/red light above the roof line of the apartment across the courtyard from me. i've seen that light before 6 years ago in south elgin illinois and thought to myself very excited "they're back". i quickly walked off the patio to the parking lot that's about 100 feet away to get a better view and was amazed to see 3 more light below the 1st light. these lights came up from due south at about the 10 o'clock position to the highest light and 9 0'clock to the lowest light. i checked my pockets for my cell phone for a camera and realized it was in the house on the coffee table. i chose to watch these lights that moved too slow for a fixed wing aircraft or helicopter. there was no noise from the lights as i tried to make as many observations as possible. these lights where orb or ball shaped and were mostly a deep but light admitting orange red color. after about 40 seconds real time even though it seemed longer, each light followed the same path of the one in front of it which was traveling upwards and to the n.W. simultaneously. all 4 light objects ascended in to the cloud deck that was aprox. 35 to 38,000 ft. up before going out of sight. this event took a total time of no more that 90 seconds from when i first observed them. i took note of the cloud wind direction which the upper level winds were coming from the north west to south east and these objects or lights were moving across the wind direction, leaving me to believe that there must have been some sort of propulsion to move them in that fashion. i walked back to my patio to get my cell phone to notify a friend when i saw a gentleman on the other side of my complex call to me and ask if i saw those lights too. his name is brian and he was clearly shook up by what he just saw and he dialed 911 from his cell to report this sighting. he asked me if i had seen them all and i told him yes i saw all four of them. he replied that he saw at least 20 of them just above tree top height and all but four had made a triangle formation and traveled off to the east and the remaining four were the lights that i described. we were discussing the event and the possibilities of what they might be other than ufos, we did conclude  they were not balloons or flares. a police officer from the st. charles pd did come out at that time and asked if we reported a 911 call. the two of us explained to the officer what we experienced and some details. the officer expressed that they felt badly that they had missed this event since they had heard of sighting like this in the past. the only other observation i can make and this is kind of hard to explain, these lights did not seem to have the ability to reflect light off of its surroundings. the full moon gives off an orah around it that admits light. these light objects did not seem to do this and reflected no light off airbourne particulates. anyway i am up for answering any questions you may have. thank you for reading and taking the time. i felt the need to report this to someone who understands
content.summary: 20 to 25 orange red lights moving under controlled conditions

content.detailedDescription:
On may 26th, 2013 at approximately 11:15 pm i turned into my girlfriend���s driveway in novi, mi.  my vehicle was facing north, as i looked into the sky and noticed a pattern of approximately seven yellow/orange glowing lights (might have been triangular in shape) moving in an extremely slow unison.   these lights were in somewhat of an arrowhead pattern and as they moved in an east to west path, they slowly, one by one, started to disappear or dissipate from the pattern until all of the lights were no longer visible.

during this time, i exited my vehicle and attempted to capture a photo of this unexplained pattern in the sky.  i was unable capture a clear image.
content.summary: Unknown object over novi michigan

content.detailedDescription:
I took my dog into the backyard at around 10:00 pm on may 25th, 2013. i was standing in the backyard and looked up into the night sky as i always do. while looking towards the southwest i saw this star-like object appear instantaneously in the area of the sky i was looking. one moment nothing was there of note (the usual sprinkling of stars) and then this bright white star-like object suddenly appears. it did not pulsate or move. its luminosity was greater than the planet venus. to give an idea of its distance, it appeared to be smaller than the size of a dime in the night sky and was about 50˚ above the southwestern horizon. this "light" remained on for 2 seconds and then seemingly "turned  off".

a good analogy to this experience would be if you were in a dark room and someone at the other side of the room turned on a flashlight, kept it on for 2 seconds and then turned it off. that's what this looked like. 

i initially thought this was a weather balloon catching the sun's rays at high altitude but i just don't know.
content.summary: Bright light suddenly appears in night sky for 2 seconds

content.detailedDescription: Me and my brother were in the car while my mother was driving, i was lookimg to the sky (in a 70��� inclination from the ground) through the window, when the car stopped the object continued stationary, it was bright and shiny, my brother did also see it, we both calculate a distance of approx. 20.000 miles or 6-10km from the ground. the object was too big, about 1 mile of length and 100 meters height, it was a bit inclined in a upwards direction and was absolutely stationary. we both were delighted with such view, i'am 22 years old and he is 20 years old. after about 10 seconds this giant object was gone. there were no clouds and the sky was absolutely blue and beautiful, it could not be a balloon nor an airplane because of the calculated high and distance from the ground.
content.summary: Cigar form ufo, aprox distance from the ground: 20.000 ft, stationary

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 9:35pm i stepped outside into my backyard (in south newmarket) and immediately noticed a triangle of three white lights in the nw horizon, towards bradford/west gillimbury. they looked like stars, in terms of size and appearance, except that they had never been there before, and they glittered gently or fluttered a reddish colour, but were predominantly white.  i don't know how far away they were, but i held up my hand and the triangle was about the same size.  at first i thought they were helicopters, but as i watched them they didn't move.  a helicopter actually passed through the triangle while i stood there (about 10 minutes after i first saw them) going east or northeast.  after approximately 15 minutes i noticed that they were slowly descending, relative to the power lines stretched across the same section of sky, but the movement was extremely slow.  after about half an hour they had descended from about 20 degrees relative to the horizon to below the treeline and out of sight.  the triangle formation was maintained the entire time.  the bottom two went out of sight first, and by the time the topmost light had also slowly descended behind the treeline the bottom two would have either a)been on the ground, or b)been beyond the horizon, though it was hard for me to tell how far away they were.  i should also note that the "fluttering" or "glimmering" was very subtle when i first noticed them, but as they got lower and lower the effect intensified, and while i could still see the last one through the trees the effect was strongest, and that's also when the reddish hue was most noticeable.

for the duration there was no noticeable sound (ie: engines, propellers, etc), and there were no regular interval blinking lights as you might see on an aircraft (as i said, one actually passed through the formation (relative to my view of them, i think they were much farther away than the aircraft) with red and blue blinking lights, so i had immediate comparison).

i'm hoping someone else saw them.  i'd love to know what this might have been.
content.summary: Three lights were in the direction of bradford which gently pulsed were in a triangle formation that slowly descended below the treeline. maintained the triangle formation the entire time over the course of about 30 minutes.

content.detailedDescription:
1. inside house waiting for radio program to come on at midnight, looked out window.
2. gian light.
3. no idea-unusual.
4. object seemed to change shape, i thought i was filming same objecting but not certain
5.Grabed camera and went outside. it was something different then i had ever observed before. it was beautiful to see.
6. watched until it disappeared.
content.summary: First observed giant white light flying object changed shape. observed similar may 22, no pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
Thought was plane at first but different color light and very slow moving.

we do have a blimp in town for a golf tournament but only 1 solid light and then it faded out.

no idea what it was, just caught my eye when closing window.
content.summary: Light came towards then turned to my left as going away and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My father was out plowing late one night back in 1968 or 69, he was plowing with an old farmall with no cab on it. he said it was after midnight when all of a sudden a very bright light out of nowhere, right over top shot straight down and lit the tractor and ground around it in a large circle. he said he looked up to see what it was but the light blinded him then the next thing it was gone. with the loud exhaust from the tractor he did not hear anything.It scared him so bad, he left the field and quit. i asked him what he thought it was and all he said was we will never know.
content.summary: Back in the late 1960s, my father was plowing ground late one night and he said all of a sudden directly above him alight shot straight down and lite the old farmall and the ground around it in a circle ,then it was gone.

content.detailedDescription:
I took my dog out to pee and happened to look up because the sun felt very warm on my arm. i was watching the cloud formations move and noticed a silvery/black shaped octagon moving at a steady pace from sw to n. the object appeared to be fairly low in the sky. i watched until it disappeared out of my view. i first thought it might be a balloon, but then saw another object moving the same path and speed. i watched for a couple of seconds and then ran in the house to get my phone/camera.  by the time i came back outside it was gone. the objects both appeared to have sides that were black and shiny silver. they appeared to be rolling around in a controlled manner 
as they moved. there wasn't much wind at the time and the thought occurred to me that these objects were moving at a pretty good clip.
content.summary: 2 octagon shape objects flew over my house 1 after the other

content.detailedDescription:
1. inside house waiting for radio program to come on at midnight, looked out window.
2. gian light.
3. no idea-unusual.
4. object seemed to change shape, i thought i was filming same objecting but not certain
5.Grabed camera and went outside. it was something different then i had ever observed before. it was beautiful to see.
6. watched until it disappeared.
content.summary: First observed giant white light flying object changed shape. observed similar may 22, no pictures.

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone - witness wishes to remain anonymous. i had to use my own phone number since the cms would not accept the report without a number. the witness would not give an exact address, e-mail or phone number but sounded credible so i am posting the report here. 

i heard a strange humming sound outside of my house which is on 100 acres of wooded area near piedmont, missouri.  i went outside to investigate what the low humming was and saw a large brightly glowing orange/red ball of light on the ne corner of my house, just above the roof line and approximately 15' from the house. it looked like a solid object underneath a halo of light surrounding it.  i was standing about 30' away from the object.  i was in shock and stood there, frozen, while calling to my 36-year old son to come out to see it, which he did.  we both watched as this object for about 20 minutes or so as it hoovered in the same spot, wavering somewhat, then it moved to the southeast and noticed that there were at least 10 more of these objects in the woods at and below the tree line about 100 yards from our position.  the object moved very slowly towards the woods, seeming to be unaware of our presence or not to care that we saw it. i tried desperately to get my cell phone to come on so i could take a picture but it would not work.  i thought the battery was drained, but after the object was out of sight the phone resumed working.  

next, we turned to go back into the house and something caught my eye.  there was a 4' tall humanoid being standing next to the tree and a little behind it.  it looked greyish but it was hard to tell in the darkness eve though there was a full moon out.  i just got a glimpse of it before it vanished.  oddly, i did not react by yelling, or running away.  the impact of what i saw did not hit me until the next day.  my son said that he did not see it.   when we got back inside i was shocked to see that it was at least 50 minutes to an hour later than when we went outside, as it seemed like only 20 minutes of time had lapsed. 

next, we heard a helicopter approach and looked out the window as it flew in the same direction as the ufos.  i have never seen a helicopter out here in my entire life.  we did not go outside to look at it. 

the fact that both of us were able to go to sleep after that was amazing to say the least.  it was as if we were in some kind of a trance-state.  the next evening my son was in town getting some groceries when he was approached by two policemen.  they asked my son how he was doing and if he believed in aliens or ever saw an alien.  he replied that he did not.  they again asked him the same questions, which he thought was very odd and again replied that he did not.  there had been no prior conversation, and he does not know these men very well so thought it very odd that they would say something like that.  he was afraid to tell them what he saw the night before.  this event triggered the memory of the prior night and when he returned home he asked me if i recalled the same things he did, which i did recall, including the sighting of the being by the tree.  we both found it extremely odd that we did not think of the previous night's event earlier in the day, or that we were not more upset by it, and had not called anyone about it.  

how did the police know about this event? we spoke to no one about it.  i called you to make this report in an effort to see if anyone else has reported anything similar but i don't want any publicity and don't want to talk to anyone else.  the whole thing has me a little scared.   

note: we have seen balls of light in this area before, and have seen unidentified objects, but nothing as close or as dramatic as this.  my parents and grandparents owned this same land for many years, and they said that all kinds of weird stuff happened here but they did not talk about it much.  my mom and dad saw a ufo over clearwater lake in the early 1970's. i remember that my grandfather talked about some missing time and seeing a red fireball back in the 1940's, and that my parents always checked and locked all the doors and windows in the house at night, even during summer when it was cool enough to leave the windows open.  they didn't talk about it much but now that i think about it that was pretty strange, since we are far away from any other houses out here.
content.summary: Large orange/red glowing ball, missing time, and humanoid entity sighting with questioning by police the next day
